deploy.project.application.starter.controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • deploy.project.application.starter.controllers.UserController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
public class UserController
extends Object
    The controller class that routes GET, POST and Delete requests to the appropriate methods.
    Author:
    Martinraj Nadar

    • Method Detail

      • getAllUsers

        @RequestMapping(value="/users",
                method=GET)
public List<User> getAllUsers()
        An intermediary method that invokes a method from the UserService class to get all the users.
        Returns:
        the list of all users

      • addUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/users",
                method=POST)
public void addUser(@RequestBody
                                                                                   User user)
        An intermediary method that invokes addUser method from the UserService class by passing a new User object.
        Parameters:
        user - - object to be added to the database.

      • getUserById

        @RequestMapping(value="/users/{id}",
                method=GET)
public Optional<User> getUserById(@PathVariable
                                                                                                     Integer id)
        An intermediary method that invokes getUserById method from the UserService class by passing an ID.
        Parameters:
        id - - Integer
        Returns:
        user - if the user exists for the given ID null - if the user does not exist.

      • deleteUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/users/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
public void deleteUser(@PathVariable
                                                                                             Integer id)
        An intermediary method that invokes deleteUser method from the UserService class to delete an existing user by passing the ID.
        Parameters:
        id - - Integer

      • logInUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/users/{userName}/{password}",
                method=GET)
public String logInUser(@PathVariable
                                                                                                            String userName,
                                                                                                            @PathVariable
                                                                                                            String password)
        An intermediary method that invokes verifyCredentials method of the UserService class
        Parameters:
        userName - - the user name associated with user
        password - - the user's password stored in the system
        Returns:
        String - which signifies if the credentials are correct.
